marklogic.body: You have to be kidding me I was a fcr for three years all I saw was unrealistic expectations and coworkers so stressed out they began suffering from depression and Anxiety. They treat their employees like shit and fire them for unrealistic reasons, the only people that love working for T-Mobile are people who kiss managements ass or are personal friends of management if you aren't you're fucked. This is literally the worst place to work all you saw was people having breakdowns and running out the building crying and quitting or the ambulance coming for people under so much stress that they would suffer health complications. Had to get this Off my chest people need to know the truth!! I was in the Tampa FL call center
